--- Page 1 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
In accordance with IMTAR – 21, Subpart C1, 21.C1.18, Subpart C2, 21.C2.9 & Subpart C3, 21.C3.1.20.
Part - I (Reference): Incident /Accident/ Snag / Explosive
a) Defect Report (DR) No: DR/2023/0733 b) Date of Occurrence: 28/05/2023
c) Installation Details: Medusa Strike - AC-4758-206 at
Sector South Station
Part - II: (Details of Defective Component)
a) Trade: Propulsion b) Date Component 04/06/2023
Received:
c) System/Sub System: Engine Control d) Main Assembly: Wing Root Starboard
e) Nomenclature: Engine Control Assembly Unit f) MOD Status: MOD-A
g) Part No.: PR-5160-B7 h) Sl No.: SN-2308-447
i) Firmware Version: Not Applicable j) Software Version: Not Applicable
k) Date of Installation: 03/03/2020 l) Date of Removal: 01/06/2023
Pg No: 112 Ln No: 28 Pg No: 33 Ln No: 23
m) Manufacturing Agency: Tactical Systems Manufacturing n) Date, Month & Year November 2015
of Manufacturing:
o) Whether under warranty: No p) Whether under AMC No
/ Repair Contract:
q) Life completed since New: 1325 Hrs / 1043 Cycles

--- Page 2 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Fuel nozzle blockage. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 15/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

--- Page 3 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part VI: Remarks by Quality Dept.
Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type.
Date: 17/06/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
Part VII: Remarks by User(Project):(if applicable)
Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection.
Date: 20/06/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
Part VIII: Remarks by ORDAQA (Quality Aspects)
Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid.
Date: 20/06/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer
Part IX: Remarks by CEMILAC / RCMA (Design Aspects)
Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound.
Date: 25/06/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma
Edition Number: 1.0 Form Version Number: 1.0 Date: January 2021
